## Common Mail Service IP Addresses

_Valid for versions 82 through the latest version_

#### Version:

#### [82](https://docs.cpanel.net/knowledge-base/email/common-mail-service-ip-addresses/)

Last modified: _2024 February 22_

* * *

## Overview

Some mail services (for example, Google Apps™) allow customers who own their own domains to relay email through different mail servers. If properly-configured SPF records do not exist for the mail service for these customers’ domains, Greylisting may identify them as spam. To prevent this, add these IP addresses and ranges to the _Trusted Hosts_ list in WHM’s [_Greylisting_](https://docs.cpanel.net/whm/email/greylisting/) interface ( _WHM_ » _Home_ » _Email_ » _Greylisting_).

## Common IP addresses and ranges

Note:

We last updated this table in February, 2024.


The following are the common mail services and their system IP addresses and ranges. Click the mail service to view its IP addresses and ranges:
